actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Montana, except by express authorization of Congress, and for other purposes.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Montana Land Sovereignty Act - Prohibits any further extension or establishment of national parks and monuments in Montana, except by express authorization of Congress.

titles.title: To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Montana, except by express authorization of Congress, and for other purposes.
